column2: an A.M. Eatery////As far as the food and service is concerned
column3: you get nothing but praise from me. Those pineapple upside-down pancakes are excellent. I also like building my own omelettes. The coffee is decent as well. The different hot sauces they provide are a nice touch
column4: and much better than plain old Tabasco. The hash browns aren't the best
column5: but the chicken sausage makes up for it. Parking can be a pain sometimes as the lot is small. You may find yourself parked on the street around the block.
